website_summaries.verdict: The Reebok Zig Pulse SE is a unique-looking, neutral road shoe that many considered to be a refreshing take on modern footwear. Despite the cool design, some were not pleased that tiny pebbles got stuck on the crevices of the sole. Others wished that there were more colorways available. Nonetheless, the majority still appreciated the shoe for its affordable price, comfort, and cushioning.
pros: Most users mentioned that the shoe felt comfortable
Some testers with foot and knee problems said that they did not feel any pain while wearing the Reebok Zig Pulse SE
Plenty of users appreciated the design of the upper and the platform
One user with a bigger body build mentioned that he felt the shoe provided plenty of support for his weight
A majority of users said that the price was affordable
A good number of reviews stated that the cushioning provided was sufficient
The shape of the shoe caters to a wider foot, said some testers
cons: A lot of reviews mentioned that pebbles easily get stuck on the crevices of the sole
Some testers were not pleased that it only came in two colorways

customer_reviews.title: work shoe
customer_reviews.text: we love thiese shoes. i work for our local law enforcement agency. and I am on my feet all day..walking running and standing around. perfect for work.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. The reason I purchased a second pair is because the first pair was very good and lasted two years. But this pair was not to the standards of the first pair. Do not buy terrible Quality.
customer_reviews.author: jose alonso

customer_reviews.title: No more aching feet./ 22 day update
customer_reviews.text: I where them at work and I am on my feet 9 to 10 hours a day. They feel great! a 22-day update on my initial review at first I rated on the 5 off of looks and comfort I'm dropping that reading to a to they still look beautiful they still are comfortable but if you're hard on shoes do not file at 22 days they electronically welded seams have started to come apart on the inside where the this is where around the toe cap to the ball of your foot where the side piece and the toe flat overlap it's electronically welded in the side where my your foot flexes that part has already started to pop.
customer_reviews.author: Carl l Moon Jr

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but not Durable
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I did not have to write this review--I've recommended these shoes to several of my co-workers because they are very light and comfortable. I've only had these for a couple of months and use them as uniform shoes for work. Unfortunately, after wearing them for this short period and for very light work, I find they do not breathe resulting in "swamp" foot after a 12-hour shift. I work exclusively indoors, so these would be terrible for someone who works outside. Also, after this short period, I noticed the upper is separating from the sole, so these will be worthless within a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: K. McGraw

customer_reviews.title: Probably the most comfortable shoe I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on recommendations from other referee's. I've had issues over the years with my heel that finally got fixed with surgery. These really make it feel like i'm not wearing anything at all on my feet. They are so comfortable. I'm now able to ref a lot longer now with no pain.
customer_reviews.author: R.A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome work shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfy stylish. I was able to buy the women’s size 10 version of this shoe and the fit was exact.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Very good for officials
customer_reviews.text: Length and width were perfect. Very light and running multiple games on crappy floors I still feel great. Only complaing is that the cut is fairly low around the ankles so the support isn't as high as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Perry

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and professional shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes come in standard width. I am barely a wide and they are very comfortable and really helps when running up and down the court. Order 1 size up, that is what I did, better to have a little more room than a too tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Bigjohn

customer_reviews.title: Reebok shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the Reebok zig pulse running shoe. I purchased a earlier model of this shoe and have worn them for two seasons of basketball and Volleyball. They're still in great shape. I will break the new pair in this year and use the older pair for softball and football next year.
customer_reviews.author: Vendor

customer_reviews.title: cheap looking and feeling
customer_reviews.text: These have been the worst Zig Technology I have ever purchased. They are brutally stiff and VERY cheap looking. Nothing like previous models I have purchased. I wore them once and could barely walk for a week after, my foot was so bruised afterwards on the sole and ball. I cannot even say how disappointed I am as I had a pair I wore for years to ref basketball with and could not be happier, these however were an epic fail.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I teach group exercise classes & a jogging class. These shoes are very comfortable and light weight but sturdy and can take abuse without showing wear.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe and shine!

customer_reviews.title: They provide cushion for your feet and knees.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoes for walking/moving
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect. I am a mail man so I walk 15 miles a day. Shoes great but only problem I had was when I stepped in wet grass I could feel at my toe moisture. This makes me think the sealing between sole and shoe may be weak. Aside from that I believe the shoes are very comfy and light which is why I bought them

customer_reviews.title: True fit, nice feel
customer_reviews.text: Shiny is certainly shiny but I already knew that is what I wanted. I order 13 and it fit true to size. They work well for basketball but i will admit that I didn’t get to ref too many games before the virus cancelled everything.

customer_reviews.title: Fit and Finish are great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. They are comfortable and look great. I did have a previous pair of them that I wore out. Therefore, I knew exactly what size to order. If I had not known my exact size I probably would have had issues and maybe returns until I got it right. Shoes are extremely hard to buy online. But, because of my prior knowledge about this shoe everything went perfectly.

customer_reviews.text: First evening I had them I officiated two games. Felt no issues at all. No break in required. Did another 60+ games and I still feel the same about them.

I would recommend to anyone who moves alot and need a really good work, workout etc sneaker. Worth the price!

product_meta.title: Reebok mens Zig Pulse Se
product_meta.description: Material: Lightweight mesh upper for breathability. Low-cut design for freedom of motion and quicker transitions. Designed for: Running, training workouts. TPU plate in the heel distributes pressure. ZigTech midsole for superior cushioning and shock absorption
feature_bullets: DURABLE AND LIGHTWEIGHT MATERIAL: These sneakers feature mesh upper for lightweight breathability and carbon rubber overlays for abrasion resistance and durability
EFFICIENT FOOT SUPPORT: These stylish trainers are designed with ZigTech midsole for superior cushioning, shock absorption and high abrasion carbon rubber outsole for durability and support

COMFORTABLE AND STURDY DESIGN: This footwear features a low-cut design that provides freedom of motion and quicker transitions, EVA sockliner adds comfort and a TPU plate in the heel distributes pressure
HIGH-PERFORMANCE RUNNING SHOES: Ideal for walking, urban running, and high-intensity training
